org.pmedv.util
Class NodeUtil

java.lang.Object
  org.pmedv.util.NodeUtil

public class NodeUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This utility class provides some convenient helper methods for the node system.

Author:
Matthias Pueski (July 2009)

compareNodes

public static java.util.ArrayList<DifferenceEntry> compareNodes(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean n1,
                                                                org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean n2)
Compares two nodes recursively and generates a list of changes between all children.

Parameters:
n1 - The left node
n2 - The right node
Returns:
an array list of DifferenceEntry

loadChildren

public static void loadChildren(java.util.ArrayList<org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean> nodes,
                                org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node)
Loads the children of any node recursively into an array list

Parameters:
nodes - an array list to load the nodes to
node - the node to load the children for

loadChildren

public static void loadChildren(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node)

Loads all the children of a specified node into the local node list. This method creates a backward link from any node to its parent in order to gather the path for any node.

This method is also useful if you want to have a linear list of the node tree.

Parameters:
node - The node to load the children for

findMaxChildId

public static java.lang.Long findMaxChildId(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node)
Finds the max child id of a child inside a single node. This methods searches inside a child node recursively, such that all children and theri according children are examined.

Parameters:
node - The node to search in.
Returns:
The highest node id

locateById

public static void locateById(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node,
                              java.lang.Long id)
Finds a node by its id inside the node. This method may return the node itself. After a successful call, the found node is stored inside the field foundNode. This makes all the recursion stuff much easier. Just do not forget to reset this field, before querying the repository.

Parameters:
node - The node to examine
id - the id of the node to find

eliminateParentLinks

public static void eliminateParentLinks(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node)

Removes all backward parent relations from all children recursively.

This method is needed to clean up a node tree before serializing with JAXB in oder to prevent cyclic hierarchies.

Parameters:
node - The node to start from

removePluginNodes

public static void removePluginNodes(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node)

Removes all plugins from a node structure.

Notice that, if a plugin node has children that they are removed too!

Parameters:
node - The node to start from

setAllChildrenPublished

public static void setAllChildrenPublished(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node)
Sets all children to published state recursively

Parameters:
node - the node to start from

removeChildById

public static void removeChildById(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean node,
                                   java.lang.Long id)
Removes a specified child from a node, this method affects all childs recursively.

Parameters:
node - The node to remove the child from
id - the id of the child to remove

updateChild

public static void updateChild(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean parent,
                               org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean child)
Updates a specified child to its new state

Parameters:
parent - The parent node to update
child - The child node to update

child -
Returns:

createMenu

public static java.lang.String createMenu(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeRepository repository,
                                          org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean currentNode,
                                          java.lang.String extension,
                                          boolean indent)

Creates the HTML menu for any given node. This function constructs a table menu with links to the according nodes (recursively). The nodes are taken from the specified repository.

The node for which the menu should be created must be provided, because the menu links of each node must correspond to the nodes hierarchy level.

Parameters:
repository - The repository to load the nodes from
currentNode - The node to create the menu for
extension - The extension to append on each link target (e.g. "*.html) *
indent - Indicates wheter the child links should be indented or not
Returns:
A String containing the html code for the menu

getLevelForNode

public static long getLevelForNode(java.lang.Long nodeId,
                                   org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeRepository repository)
Gets the hierarchical level of a node. The hierarchy starts with level 0

Parameters:
nodeId - The node to get the level for
repository - the repository to search in
Returns:
the level of the hierarchy of the node

getPathForNode

public static java.lang.String getPathForNode(java.lang.Long nodeId,
                                              org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeRepository repository)
Creates the hierarchical path for a given node

Parameters:
nodeId - The id of the node to create the path for
repository - The repository from which the node should be taken
Returns:
The path string for the node e.g. parent1/child1/subchild1 ... and so on

externalizeImages

public static java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.String> externalizeImages(org.pmedv.beans.objects.NodeBean currentBean,
                                                                      java.lang.String targetLocation)
                                                               throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Replaces all local links to images with the specified targetLocation. This method is user to pass the node with its images to the server.

Parameters:
currentBean - The node to externalize the image links for
targetLocation - the new location for the image.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
